Equipment Actions.Action 1: Slam, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Shambling Mound makes 2 Slam attacks, if both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target becomes grappled and the Shambling Mound uses its Engulf on it
Other Actions.Action 2: Engulf, The Shambling Mound engulf a Medium or smaller creature, blinding, restraining and suffocating them.  Engulfed creatures are Bludgeoned while inside the Mound, taking an Average 13 damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Lightning Absorption, Whenever the Shambling Mound is subjected to Lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains HP
